entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Bay Roberts

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High 6 except plus 3 in onshore winds. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers this morning. Clearing near noon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High 6 except plus 3 in onshore winds. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Friday 29 April 2016

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 1.
